name: shadowily
content:
shadowily adverb
(DIFFICULT TO SEE)
Add to word list
Add to word list
in a way that is dark and hard to see: Our eyes detected a figure shadowily visible against the wall. Millie thought she saw a bear lurking shadowily in the woods.

shadowily adverb
(MYSTERIOUS)
in a way that is mysterious and about which little is known: The relationship between the two organizations was only shadowily defined until we uncovered evidence of sinister dealings taking place between them. Secrets that had only been shadowily visible started to come to the surface.
